publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2671.1 Ted Brocklebank: Scottish Broadcasting Commissionâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2671) in the name of Linda Fabiani, after second "broadcasting industry" insert "but believes that further work needs to be done on a suitable funding model, which ensures a substantial private sector input so that the cost does not fall wholly on the taxpayer"
